param.name: series_imagefolder
param.label: Series Thumbnail Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to series images like /images/series. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: media_imagefolder
param.label: Media Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to media images like /images/media. If left blank then /components/com_biblestudy/images is assumed.

param.name: teachers_imagefolder
param.label: Teacher Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to teacher images like /images/teachers. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: study_images
param.label: Study Thumbnails Image Folder
param.description: Path from images folder to study thumbnail images like /images/thumbnails. If left blank then /images/stories is assumed.

param.name: download
param.label: Default Show Download Button
param.description: Set to Yes if you wish all mediafile records to automatically have the Show Download button selected.

param.name: target
param.label: Default target type
param.description: Set to a particular target type as default.

param.name: server
param.label: Default Server
param.description: Choose a default server from your list.

param.name: path
param.label: Default Folder
param.description: Choose a default folder from your list.

param.name: podcast
param.label: Default Podcast
param.description: Choose a default podcast from your list.

param.name: mime
param.label: Default Mime Type
param.description: Choose a default mime type from your list.

param.name: allow_entry_study
param.label: Allow Front End Submission
param.description: Allow certain users to enter studes and mediafiles from the front end

param.name: entry_access
param.label: Access Front End Submission
param.description: Enter the level of access required for users to enter study information on the front end

param.name: study_publish
param.label: Auto Publish front end submissions
param.description: Choose whether studies entered on the front end are automatically published or must be manually published by an admin on the backend

param.name: itemidlinktype
param.label: AVR Itemid
param.description: If you experience problems with AVR, try using one of these settings
param.option: Try to find an Itemid from the menu

param.name: itemidlinkview
param.label: Choose type of view for Itemid
param.description: Pick the type of view to search for an Itemid in the menu

param.name: itemidlinknumber
param.label: Itemid to use (set above)
param.description: Put in an Itemid for AVR to use and set the choice above
